nodes.text: Star Wars Lost Stars, Vol. 2 is a canon trade paperback compilation of Lost Stars, a manga which adapts Claudia Gray's novel of the same name. The manga was first released in Japan by Line Corporation on April 20, 2019 and later in the United States by Yen Press on September 3, 2019.
The conclusion of the thrilling manga adaptation of Claudia Gray's Star Wars Lost Stars novel! What does destiny have in store for Thane and Ciena?
